name: Alstom
membership: Alstom is a member of a number of associations including, but not limited to: UNIFE, AFEP, MEDEF, Shift2Rail and Hydrogen Europe.
goal:
As a promoter of sustainable mobility, Alstom develops and markets systems, equipment and services for the transport sector.
Alstom offers a complete range of solutions (from high-speed trains to metros, tramways and e-buses), passenger solutions, customised services (maintenance, modernisation), infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility solutions.
Alstom is a world leader in integrated transport systems.
The company recorded sales of €7.3 billion and booked €10.0 billion of orders in the 2016/17 fiscal year. Headquartered in France, Alstom is present in over 60 countries and employs 32,800 people.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
. In the transport field, sustainable mobility, railway policy, infrastructure funding and financing.
. In the transversal domain legislation concerning trade policy, R&D and Competition policy.
